text: Azide, also known as trinitride, is an ion. It is formed when hydrazoic acid is deprotonated. It is a powerful reducing agent. Its chemical formula is N3-. The most common azide is sodium azide. Many azides are explosive and very toxic. ==Related pages== *Hydrazine *Nitrite *Nitrate Category:Nitrogen compounds Category:Anions
title: Azide
